short_description: Discover China, the world's most populous country, where ancient history meets modern innovation. Explore the Great Wall, experience vibrant megacities like Beijing and Shanghai, discover diverse landscapes from mountains to deserts, and immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage of this vast nation.

health.tap_water_safety: Not safe to drink - bottled or filtered water is recommended
alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, restaurants, and stores
China has a rich tradition of baijiu and other traditional alcoholic beverages

tipping.hotels: Tipping is not traditionally expected but becoming more common in tourist areas
tipping.guides: Tipping is appreciated for tour guides, though not mandatory
tipping.restaurants: Tipping is not traditional but becoming more common in upscale restaurants
tipping.taxis: Tipping is not expected but rounding up is appreciated

weather.title: China has diverse climates ranging from subarctic in the north to tropical in the south. The country experiences four distinct seasons in most regions, with significant regional variations due to its vast size and varied topography.

when_to_visit.title: Spring & Autumn
when_to_visit.time_period: March to May, September to November
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild and pleasant temperatures with beautiful seasonal colors, especially during autumn. Perfect for sightseeing, exploring cities, visiting the Great Wall, and outdoor activities. Ideal weather for most regions

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm to hot temperatures across most of the country. Good for visiting northern regions and high-altitude areas. Southern regions can be very hot and humid. Great time for festivals and cultural events

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Cold temperatures in the north, milder in the south. Perfect for winter sports in northern regions and exploring cities without the summer crowds. Great time to visit southern regions like Hainan

weather.best_time: The best time to visit China is during the spring (March to May) and autumn (September to November) months when the weather is mild and pleasant, making it ideal for exploring cities, visiting historical sites, and enjoying outdoor activities
